name: @muya-ui/utils
author: Muya UI Team
title: Muya UI Base
description: Muya UI - The base library of Muya UI

scripts.clean: cross-env rimraf lib && cross-env rimraf es && cross-env rimraf types && cross-env rimraf tsconfig-build.tsbuildinfo
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:types && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel --root-mode upward src -d lib --ignore **/*.test.ts,**/*.test.tsx,**/demos/*.ts,**/demos/*.tsx --extensions ".ts,.tsx"
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel --root-mode upward src -d es --ignore **/*.test.ts,**/*.test.tsx,**/demos/*.ts,**/demos/*.tsx --extensions ".ts,.tsx"
